unit_type.description: Which unit type this set applies to.

aim_info_name.description: [string]The name of the aim info settings that describe the targeting for this variable set. Leave empty for hotbox.

pitch_var.description: [string]Name of the anmiation variable that controls pitch.

yaw_var.description: [string]Name of the anmiation variable that controls yaw.

neutral_pitch.description: Pitch at which this should return to while not in use.

neutral_yaw.description: Yaw at which this should return to while not in use.

neutral_speed.description: Speed at which pitch and yaw return to neutral while not in use.

aim_constraint.description: [string]Name of the aim constraint target this should set.

aim_constraint_distance.description: Distance from the pivot node to the aim constraint target.

limits.description: Limits of the animation variables (pitch and yaw).

normalized.description: [bool]If set the animation variables are set to normalized (0-1) values instead of degrees.

pivot_node.description: [string]The aim constraint position is relative to this node.

rotation_start_event.description: [string]Audio event to trigger when the turret starts rotating.

rotation_stop_event.description: [string]Audio event to trigger when the turret stops rotating.
